snippet: The bank reported profit of $2.9 billion, or 95 cents a share, although its revenue fell to $18.6 billion.
abstract: The bank reported profit of $2.9 billion, or 95 cents a share, although its revenue fell to $18.6 billion.

headline.main: Citigroup's Profit Down 12%, but Beats Estimates
headline.print_headline: Citigroup’s Profit Drops, But Beats Expectations
